attributes.action: U.K to Join the EU Free Trade Area (EFTA)
attributes.additional_details: This would minimize the effect of Brexit on the UK economy, benefit U.K and Multi National Businesses, keep movements of Goods,services and People and will keep opertunities alive for the current and future generations from engineers to artists free movement is vital.
attributes.background: Due to the result of the EU Referendum on the 23rd of July 2016 to leave the EU, we would ask our government to nagotiate a deal to join the European Free Trade Area (EFTA) and to include the free movement of people.
